iginx.host.description: IginX server host to connect to, Default = 127.0.0.1

iginx.port.description: IginX server port to connect to, Default = 6888

iginx.time.precision.description: the time precision to display. Default = 'ms'

iginx.outfile.dir.description: physical path to storage download files, change it to your own path

iginx.fetch.size.description: Number of files downloaded at one batch, Default = '1000'

iginx.outfile.max.num.description: The max number of dir in outfile path, Default = '100'

iginx.outfile.max.size.description: The max size(MB) of dir in outfile path, Default = '10240'

iginx.file.http.port.description: The port of File HTTP server, Default = '18082'

iginx.zeppelin.upload.file.max.size.description: The Max Size of upload file, Default = 10GB

iginx.zeppelin.upload.dir.max.size.description: The Max Size of upload directory, Default = 200GB

iginx.zeppelin.note.font.size.enable.description: If enable the same font size in the note scope, Default = false

iginx.zeppelin.note.font.size.description: Font size in not scope, Default = 9

iginx.file.http.host.description: The host of File HTTP server, Default = ''

iginx.graph.tree.enable.description: If true, the result of show columns will be displayed as a tree; otherwise, it will be displayed as forest, Default = true
